venue.address_1: 59 South Kent Road S. Kent, CT 06785
venue.name: Club Getaway

item.description:
More info & to sign up: http://www.clubgetaway.com/affil/default.asp?AffiliateMicroSiteID=968

 

 

Join us for a weekend of sports, fun and adventure! At Club Getaway you can get everything you want in a vacation in one all inclusive weekend. Whether your idea of a perfect weekend is packed with activities, trying new adventures, partying the night away, meeting new friends or just relaxing in the great outdoors, it’s the perfect weekend getaway.


Club Getaway is set on 300 acres overlooking a sparkling lake in the beautiful Berkshire Mountains. It’s just 90 minutes from New York by car or Getaway bus, and 2.5 hours from Boston.


Kick start your summer with the Memorial Day season opening weekend. Get out and hike & bike, water ski & kayak around the lake, take a lesson in tennis or golf, team up for volleyball & basketball, or try the zip lines & rock climbing. Wants something more relaxing? Than join a yoga or fitness class, enjoy a dance or wine tasting class, or just hang out with new friends by the lake.


Memorial Day Weekend highlights the hottest special events. Party with “The Zoo” … voted #1 cover band by MTV and hit the dance floor with the pop sensation tribute band “The Sixties Show” or put on your toga for the best Toga Party you’ve been to since college. Experience the thrill of white water canoeing, or team up for the Cupcake Wars. Pack your bag and your sense of adventure and get ready for an unforgettable weekend!

When: Memorial Day Weekend Friday, May 27th – Monday, 30th (3 full days)


Party Begins: 5:30pm by car or getaway bus

Location: Club Getaway, Kent, CT – 90 minutes from NYC

Savings: Save $25 by mentioning Moxie in the City!

More info & to sign up: http://www.clubgetaway.com/affil/default.asp?AffiliateMicroSiteID=968

Weekend Includes: All meals, wine with dinner, all sports and activities with pro instruction, sports equipment, nightly entertainment and lodging.

 

REGISTER HERE: - http://www.clubgetaway.com/affil/default.asp?AffiliateMicroSiteID=968 or call us at 877-746-7529
item.name: Memorial Day Weekend Getaway
